overview: When straight A student Eve is asked to housesit a tropical mansion, her naughty fantasies become reality for the first time. As the sun beats down, Eve bares all for her voyeuristic neighbors, frisky friends and one seductive photographer. Sun, surf and sexy babes! See Eve let loose and fulfill all her inner desires.
tagline: Girl gone Crazy! An A student in the classroom... and a double D on the beach.
title: Eve's Beach Fantasy
